overview: This film integrates a series of testimonies based on the memory and myth of the last surviving Zapatistas, those peasants who, led by Emiliano Zapata, during the decade from 1910 to 1920, in central Mexico, radicalized the Mexican Revolution by becoming warriors to reconquer their lands and their freedom.

production_companies.name: Dirección General de Actividades Cinematográficas de la UNAM

title: Testimonios zapatistas
